column1: nice start. Full and straight, 141 kph. Some swing, not a lot. Worked to midwicket
lovely start. Just opened up his stance a touch. Knew there would be some inswing. Full and straight, drilled through mid-off. Full face of the bat. Great timing
drags that length back right away. Good bowling. Saw if there was some swing early on, didn't quite work so he pulled his length back, forcing Roy to defend
full and wide outside off, mis-timed drive to mid-on. Leaden footed too. That's how he plays though
full and wide outside off, Roy strides forward and carves a punchy cut through backward point.
good length delivery on off, a shovelled stab to midwicket. Tidy over for Gujarat. Lovely pace in this surface
the googly to start. Flat on off, pushed to long-on. Didn't quite pick that, read it off the pitch
another googly, outside off, full. Driven back to the bowler. Doesn't look comfortable against legspin

well, there is an option if you're not picking it. A flat straight delivery on middle and off. Roy gets outside the line and reverse-sweeps through point. So much power, a more productive area for Roy
the quicker delivery but ill-directed. Down leg. Wide
not picking it again. Flat and quick on leg, hits Roy on the pad. Goes through his legs to the keeper
yikes, a rank long-hop. Filthy. Sat up for Roy too. Pulled to deep square leg
84 kph, another one that was not the legspinner. Flat and straight, pushed to long-on. Well played by these two
the seam-up delivery? He has one that floats out, seams away. Full outside off, driven to mid-off
that was rubbish from KKR. Flat and wide outside off, plenty of width. McCullum cuts towards backward point where Kuldeep dives over the ball and allows the boundary
flat outside off, blocked towards cover
ooh, 92 kph. Full, quick and straight. McCullum closes the bat face too early, a leading edge towards point for one. Lucky for Baz
too full from Narine. Full and straight, driven to long-on
quick and straight, McCullum walks right across and works to fine leg. Had to make connection, he walked too far

that was a rubbish delivery that gets the wicket. What a way to go. A filthy long-hop on leg. Roy gets into position to pull, but somehow gets a leading edge. Hangs in the air for a while before settling in Yusuf's hands at square leg, running to his right from midwicket. Not the best IPL debuts for Roy.
flat and slowish outside off, a nervous prod towards point
well played. Percentage stroke. A flat delivery on off, sits up for Raina and he plays a low-risk pull to deep midwicket
that's maaaasive. Enough he's had. Flat and straight, McCullum clears his front leg and gives the ball a good thwack. A slog sweep way over midwicket, Not much spin in this surface so far
well bowled. Slower through the air outside off, skids on after pitching, forcing McCullum to defend
played that off the stumps. Flat and quick on off, aiming towards the top of off. Guided to short third man
nicely bowled. Nicely played. Full, swerving back in towards off. Raina gets forward and pushes to long-off
slogged away, but finds the gap wide of long-on for a couple. Full and straight, stabbed away into the gap
flat. Almost went for six. McCullum backs away, Narine drops short. Scythes a cut with so much power over point. No chance. Gained elevation
well played by both parties. Full and straight, McCullum sees a good delivery and defends
too short again. Sits up for McCullum on middle, pulled easily through square leg. They have erred short instead of full
good end. Full and straight, McCullum blocks
so much power that even the parry goes for four. That's a superb stroke. Overpitched on middle, Raina drills a drive straight back at Woakes, who gets a right hand on it. Deflects for four anyway
slower ball on off, hit to mid-off. Full face of the bat
good length down leg, Raina backs away. Woakes follows him. Flicked down to the backward square leg boundary. Exceptional batting. Raina looks switched on today. These are all high-percentage strokes
a slower ball on leg, shovelled through midwicket for a couple

dropped! Tough catch. Kuldeep got there but couldn't quite cling on as his arms hit the ground. Short delivery on middle, Raina was surprised by the length. Pulls anyway, hangs in the air for a while, allowing Kuldeep to move to his left and backwards from mid-on. Catches it, but the ball spills out
worked away to midwicket, slower ball
the wrong un to start from Kuldeep. McCullum gets forward and blocks
walks across and works the ball to midwicket. Well played.
a good stroke. Slightly short from Kuldeep, Raina goes back and cuts to deep point
75 kph, another wrong 'un on middle and off. Blocked
this is first legspinner to McCullum. Short on middle and leg, pulled to deep square leg. In front of square

fantastic 1-2 batting. Knew Kuldeep would be conscious of not bowling short again. He floated this up. McCullum ran forward, got to the pitch and smashed the ball dead straight. Over the long-off boundary
full on leg, worked to square leg for a run
a slower short ball on middle, McCullum is too early on middle. Under-edged to the keeper
strays down leg, ill-directed. Off the pad towards fine leg for one
a slower ball on middle, worked to midwicket for one. Good change in pace. Raina was waiting for the short delivery
slogged. A proper one. Full on off, shovelled to deep midwicket. Clears his front stance
too straight and Raina helps himself to some runs. On the pads, worked to the fine leg boundary. The fielder was in the circle

that was plumb! Just misses a straight one does McCullum. Full and straight from Kuldeep, on middle. The legbreak. Spun towards leg, struck McCullum in front of leg. Could it have spinning down? May have been too full for the umpire to consider that option. Didn't look a bad decision at first glance.
a low full toss, Finch chose a good option. Got low to paddle sweep, but got a toe-end towards square leg
flat and straight, nudged away towards midwicket
beauty. The googly outside off, Finch plays the line but is beaten on the outside edge. Lovely deception in the air
flat, but short. Allows Finch to go back and slap to long-off
worked away towards square leg for a single
flat and straight, worked away through square leg. Clever batting. Use up all these middle overs
in the arc, and Finch gives it a whacking. How dare you float one up? On off and middle. Finch gets low and muscularly pulls over midwicket
this is even bigger. This is humongous. Slightly flatter but on middle and leg, heaved away over square leg. Exceptional batting. has almost removed him from bowling again
slightly short outside off, cut to deep point
short and slow, pushed to long-on
flat and wide outside off, a chopped cut towards point
lobbed up outside off, Raina chips a drive down to long-off on the front foot

Finch holes out to wide long-off. Suryakumar pulls off the finger-on-the-lip celebration. This is the tossed-up googly from Kuldeep. Finch backed away outside leg to loft it over the covers. He probably picked the googly but did not get the execution right; sliced it off the outside edge to long-off running to his left
straight ball on middle, hangs back and nudges to midwicket
flat and fired on off, back-foot chop to cover
Kuldeep hangs it up in the air on off, dabbed through cover
slides on outside off, Raina hangs back, uses the pace, and late-dabs a single to short third man
back of a length and outside off, bounces over Raina's cut
inswinging yorker on off stump, 134ks, dug out to mid-on
short and outside off, can't get it to rise at the chest, Raina rides the bounce and guides the ball through backward square leg
Karthik steps out, meets a short ball on off and turns it to long leg
hip-high short ball outside off, Raina rides the bounce and pulls it away behind square
full-toss swings in on off, helped to long leg
short of a length on off, Raina stands tall and punches a single to long-on
pitched up and outside off, non-turner, Karthik plants his front foot and crunches away to the right of sweeper cover
full offbreak on off, knocked to leg with the spin
dug short on middle, backs away and cuts firmly to sweeper cover
nice dipping offbreak on off, Karthik pokes it back to the bowler
dropped short and wide outside off, cut away straight to point
skids on outside off, too full for a cut, Raina chops and misses

Boult saves four runs for his side. He ventures to his left from deep midwicket to track down this loft from Raina. Boult pouches the ball, then tumbles over the boundary, but before he fell over he had the presence of mind to toss the ball back into the field of play. Superb effort from Boult
Raina uses his feet again, he is nowhere close to the pitch, slices it in front of the advancing long-off
Raina uses his feet again, attempts the loft again, this is the googly, turning away from him. Raina carves it over the off-side infield
googly to the right-hander outside off. The length is short, allowing Karthik to cut to sweeper
Raina shimmies out, Chawla drags his length back. Punched down to long-on for one
non-turning offbreak on middle, Raina shimmies out and clips to square leg
Karthik eyes a reverse sweep, this bounces more, takes the top-edge and runs to third man
straight short ball on middle, down the track and punched to long-off
this is drummed away to the left of sweeper cover. It was a bad length, though. Short and wide outside off, Karthik rocks back and unleashes a rasping square cut
full on middle and leg, driven down to wide long-on with the wrists
tossed outside off, this is a Raina special, chipped inside out over extra cover
down the track, gets too close to the pitch, and drives a single to long-on
dragged short on middle, pulled powerfully on the back foot to deep midwicket
slower through the air, turns away outside off, Raina having stepped out is beaten in the air but somehow defends it

tossed up on leg, Raina uses his feet and chips it in the air. The ball lands in between deep midwicket and long-on. Karthik wants two, Raina doesn't. There is a horrible mid-pitch mix-up. They eventually chance the second, Karthik is forced to pull out a full-length dive. Kuldeep collects the ball but does not even attempt to disturb the stumps. Bizarre. Even if Kuldeep had ferried the ball to Uthappa, Raina would have been out at the other end
full on the stumps, clipped to midwicket
Kuldeep throws it up, regulation legbreak, lifted over extra cover
seam-up, short ball on off, 113ks, Raina whips it towards deep midwicket and brings up a half-century
length-ball legbreak outside off, steered through cover

Dropped by Yusuf! Raina is living a charmed life. Yusuf runs to his left from deep midwicket, makes a mess of the reverse cup, and drops a regulation catch. Tossed up on the pads, Raina skies a slog sweep
Karthik attempts a reverse sweep, gets a tickle onto it as the ball rolls to third man
full on the stumps, whipped to deep midwicket
seam-up ball, 111ks, Karthik does not care. He eyes up a big mow and launches the ball over midwicket
Raina moves away outside leg, this is a yorker following him, hint of inswing. Jabbed to cover
near yorker outside off, Karthik swishes and misses
Karthik hares down the track, takes a full-toss, and chips it. The ball lands in the middle of advancing deep midwicket and wide long-on
very full and sliding down leg, past the glance, wide
Boult has bowled an excellent ball but it rolls down to the fine leg boundary. Inswinging yorker, inside-edged away
Boult misses his length, full-toss on leg stump, dragged now to square-ish long leg

mid-off is inside the circle and Karthik absolutely belts it straight of the fielder. Boult misses his length again. On a good length and outside off, Karthik gets forward and drills it away with authority
looks like a slower offcutter outside off, bounces, Raina swings early and misses
Mid-pitch collision. Raina, ball-watching, rams into Woakes. The bowler is down. He gets up and shares a laugh with Raina. This was short and wide outside off, scythed to point
good length and outside off, right in the slot, Karthik presses forward and hoists it powerfully over long-on
Woakes misses his length and line. Short and wide outside off - possibly a slower ball - Karthik picks it up and flays it over backward point
errs in length and gets away. Full-toss on middle and leg, swiped to only deep square leg
backward point it up and third man is up. Poor ball. Short and attached with a lot of width outside off, Raina now flays it away in the gap between the two men behind square
shimmies out, misses the flick against a full-toss, hits the pad and rolls square
Raina moves away outside leg, Boult follows him with a full-toss, which is driven to the right of the bowler
slower ball outside off, 111ks, Karthik picked it, waited for it to arrive and then gloriously lofted the offcutter over extra cover, who had come in before this over
Karthik has reversed it over short third man. 138ks, pace on the ball, length on middle. Karthik pre-meditated, shuffled away and reverse swatted it over the fielder. He is in top form
short ball, homing in towards the shoulder, Karthik can't control a pull. He is beaten for pace and holes out to wide long-on
Raina applies the finishing touches with a crackling boundary. Overpitched and outside off, Raina leans into it and drives it to the left of a diving backward point to the right of cover
swing. Full and straight from Praveen, swinging in. Worked down to fine leg
good length delivery around off, solidly kept out. Good channels from Praveen. Just a hint of movement
a partial stop. Full and wide outside off, drilled to McCullum at mid-off who dives to his left, but concedes the run
beauty. Good length delivery, this one pitches and moves away even though it came in in the air. Gambhir looks to defend but is beaten
almost got through. Fullish delivery on off, the ball moves back. A thick inside edge towards square leg. Lovely bowling, moving both ways
yikes. Full and straight, Lynn wants to go straight but goes after it so hard that the ball skews off the inside half towards the square leg boundary. All power in that
good length delivery on middle and leg, chipped away towards mid-on
that is huge. Don't bowl there. Full delivery on leg, Lynn stays in his crease, sees length and then wallops a heave way over midwicket. Massive six. Shot.
change in pace, slower ball on off, pushed towards cover for a run
smashed away. Another slower delivery outside off, hammered through mid-on for four. All power.
good comeback. Good length delivery around off, blocked back
good end. On a length around off, Gambhir opens the bat face and guides the ball backwards of point for a run
not treated with too much respect. Full delivery outside off, drilled through mid-off. In the slot. Not a good start
good length delivery on off, played away towards midwicket for a run. Good change up from Gony, well played too
a slower delivery very wide outside off, left alone and wide called
on the bounce for four. Good length delivery around off, pulled away over mid-on for four. This is sensational ball-striking

that's gone 6800 metres back. Wow. Wow. How? Full delivery outside off, right in the arc and Lynn hammers a lofted drive with so much power that it lands more than 20 rows back. These are massive boundaries
good length on middle, comes back in and Lynn misses his swat. Over the stumps
Lynn has thrown Gony out of his line, length, rhythm, everything.  A back of a length delivery strays down  leg
good length around the top of off, punched towards backward point. Boo.
tripe. Flat delivery waaay down leg, Gambhir pulls him down to the fine leg boundary with ease. Behind square
dabbed away towards short third man. No run there
good stop by Praveen. More filth from Kaushik. Good length delivery down leg, pulled away towards short fine leg. Praveen dives to his right to save three
flat, quick and full outside off, 101 kph, sliced to extra cover. Smashed
skids on with the arm. Flat and quick outside off, goes through Lynn's cut
carved over backward point. Four more. Full and wide outside off, Lynn slices a drive over backward point. What a start
fullish delivery outside off, Gambhir misses a guide to third man. He isn't happy with that
excellent bowling. Full and straight, defended back up the pitch
dabbed away towards point for a run. Good batting. Didn't lose his head after two dot balls
on the bounce. Well bowled actually. Pace off the ball on a length, Lynn swats a pull to deep midwicket
picks up the variation and swings it away. Slower delivery on off, swung away over mid-on for four. Lovely batting.
on the pads, Gambhir misses a flick and is struck on the pad. Towards square leg for one.
over backward square leg. This isn't good bowling. Short on leg, easily pulled over square leg for four. Dropping too short, too often
through the keeper's legs. Flat outside off, the ball skids on, beats Gambhir's edge and goes through Karthik's legs.
better. Flat and straight, defended
four more. Quick, full, straight, Gambhir knows exactly where the fielders are. Swept over midwicket for four
an outside edge, flat delivery outside off. Goes past Dhawal's outstretched hand at short third man. That's not a bad delivery.
add four to that. Down leg, worked away to the fine leg boundary. Nowhere near the fielder.
my gosh. That's how he's treating new bowlers. Full and straight, Lynn clears his front leg and smashes it way over long-on. Huge
a pull over long-off for four. Back of a length delivery outside off, Lynn flat-bats a swat over the bowler's head
a bouncer, got more height on that. Lynn sways out of the line
over deep midwicket. Short delivery on off, Lynn opens up his stance and pummels a flat six over Roy on the boundary. He wasn't right at the boundary. Would have been out had he been back
another flat six. Full and wide outside off, again overpitched. Lynn creams a delivery over long-off. Phew, sensational power
a 19-ball fifty for Lynn. What form, what power, what confidence. Good length delivery outside off, scythed to deep point
short on middle, pushed to long-on for a run
worked away towards deep backward square leg. That's all they need to do now
slow through the air on middle, some turn. Pushed to long-off from the crease
great batting. Flat on leg, worked to deep midwicket for a couple
slides on with the arm. Flat and wide outside off, guided to deep backward point for a couple more
nudged away to midwicket. Tidy end
under-edged for four. Flat and wide outside off, very wide, would have been called had Lynn not got bat on that. Under Karthik's gloves and to the boundary
full outside off, better line. Gambhir plays for some turn, there is none. Beaten on the outside edge
guided away towards backward point for a run
99 kph outside off, beaten on the swat.
guided away to backward point. Good comeback from Kaushik there
chipped away over cover. Flat on off, lifted over cover for a couple. Neatly played
nudged to midwicket. Full and straight
flat and straight, guided away to deep point.
hammered away to cover. Raina saves two by sticking his right arm out. Full and wide outside off.
punched to long-off, this is good batting
runs down and works the ball to long-on for a run. Another fifty for Gambhir, keeps racking them up
wayward again, short and wide outside off, off-side wide
length ball outside off, Gambhir drives on the up but can't get it past cover
back of a length and outside off, Gambhir leans back and carves it away to the left of sweeper cover
pitched up and outside off, Gambhir takes it on the up and drills it over extra cover. What a way to bring up the highest opening stand for KKR
stump-to-stump line, played back, Gambhir eyes a single, it isn't there, so decides against it
Gony is bowling tripe. Hip-high short ball outside off, swatted away to the midwicket fence. Gambhir might send the bowler a thank you note later
another wayward short ball, this is even wider outside off. Gambhir merrily scythes it away over point
sliding down leg from around the wicket, beats DK and rolls away to the fine leg fence
arm ball, fizzes in on middle, solidly punched down the ground
tossed up on off stump, Gambhir steps out, collapses his back leg and drives it inside out over extra cover. Delightful shot
a whirl of the wrists now sends this full one to deep midwicket
tossed up slower on off, driven on the front foot to long-on
slightly overpitched and outside off, driven to the right of long-off. Baz chases, slides at the edge of the fence, and saves two
breaking down leg, wide
down the track and clipped out to deep midwicket
tucked off the hips for one
overpitched and outside off, belted down the ground
shortish and outside off, Gambhir controls a pull to deep midwicket
PK sends down an off-stump yorker, which is dug down to long-on
slower short offcutter, Gambhir waits for the ball to arrive and paddles to long leg
leg-stump yorker, swerves in a touch and raps the pad. They cross over for a leg bye
half-tracker outside off, Kaushik hasn't got his length right at all. Lynn lays into it, tonking the ball over long-on
speared wide outside off, crunched to sweeper
length ball skids across off, guided to short third man
98ks hurled on off, non-turner, defended back
back of a length on off, a muscular tug to deep midwicket
back of a length and fizzes away outside off, past the outside edge
off-side wide. The night keeps getting worse for the Gujarat bowlers

Dropped! Would you believe it, Baz drops the catch, parries the ball over the long-off boundary. This is now the best opening stand in the IPL. Off-stump full-toss, swung away in the air. Baz can't cling onto the overhead chance
Dropped again! Back of a length on middle, clobbered away again. Smith advances from deep square, tumbles, and shells it
there is no stopping Lynn. This is a front-foot pull. Muscled over Baz at long-on
off-side wide
slower offcutter, Lynn is through with the slog. Drags an inside edge past midwicket

low-full toss outside off, carved away to the right of sweeper cover. Gony runs across and fumbles, sumps up Gujarat's sloppy effort in the field. KKR canter to a 10-wicket win. This is the highest total chased down with all ten wickets in tact in all T20 cricket. Well done, KKR. Perfect start to the season
